Name: fungal esophagitis
Definition: A candidiasis that involves fungal infection of the esophagus by Candida albicans in immunocompromised people

Name: bacterial esophagitis
Definition: A somatoform disorder that involves persistently complaints of varied physical symptoms that have no identifiable physical origin.

Name: eosinophilic esophagitis
Definition: An esophagitis characterized by inflammation involving eosinophils located_in esophagus.

Name: obsolete acute psychogenic paranoid psychosis
Definition: An esophagitis characterized by inflammation involving eosinophils located_in esophagus.

Name: peptic esophagitis
Definition: A female breast cancer that is located_in the lower-outer qudrant of the breast.

Name: obsolete primary pulmonary coccidioidomycosis
Definition: A coccidioidomycosis that results_in pneumonia located_in lungs

Name: viral esophagitis
Definition: A Simplexvirus infectious disease that results_in inflammation located_in esophagus
